channel.title: Map on Golang for all
channel.description: Recent content in Map on Golang for all

item.title: sync.Map
item.description: Let’s take a look at sync.Map usage and its source code.

item.title: Data handling in concurrent programs
item.description: In Go, we have goroutines functionality out of the box. We can run code in parallel. However, in our parallel running code we can work with shared variables, and it is not clear how exactly Go handles such situations.

item.title: Principles of map type in GO
item.description: The map programming interface in Go is described in the Go blog. We just need to recall that a map is a key-value storage and it should retrieve values by key as fast as possible.
